content: in the first st followed by 1 double_crochet in the next st repeat around join with a slip_stitch 30 sts round 4 chain 1 make 1 single_crochet in the first followed by 2 single_crochet in the next st then 1 single_crochet in the next st repeat around join with a slip_stitch 40 sts round 5 chain 1 make 3 half_double_crochet in each st around join with a slip_stitch 120 sts *fasten_off and weave in the yarn tail stack on top of the bottom bun burger outside brown round 1 make a magic_ring chain 2 into the magic_ring make 10 double_crochet join with a slip_stitch 10 sts round 2 chain 2 make 2 double_crochet in each st around join with a slip_stitch 20 sts round 3 chain 2 make 2 double_crochet in the first st followed by 1 double_crochet in the next st repeat around join with a slip_stitch 30 sts round 4 chain 1 make 1 single_crochet in the first followed by 2 single_crochet in the next st then 1 single_crochet in the next st repeat around join with a slip_stitch 40 sts *work in the back loop for round 5 only round 5-6 chain 1 make 1 single_crochet in each st around join with a slip_stitch 40 sts *fasten_off and weave in the yarn tail inside of burger brown make two round 1 make a magic_ring chain 2 into the magic_ring make 10 double_crochet join with a slip_stitch 10 sts round 2 chain 2 make 2 double_crochet in each st around join with a slip_stitch 20 sts round 3 chain 2 make 2 double_crochet in the first st followed by 1 double_crochet in the next st repeat around join with a slip_stitch 30 sts fasten_off and weave in place the two brown place on top of the the yarn tail circles inside the burger lettuce cheese yellow row 1 chain 13 start in the second chain from the hook make 1 single_crochet in each chain across 12 sts row 2-14 chain 1 turn make 1 single_crochet in each st across 12 sts *fasten_off and weave in the yarn tails place on top of the burger tomato start with light pink round 1 make a magic_ring chain 1 into the magic_ring make 8 single_crochet join with a slip_stitch 8 sts *colour scheme for round 2 pink chain 2 3 double_crochet red 2 double_crochet pink 3 double_crochet red 2 double_crochet pink 3 double_crochet red 2 double_crochet pink 3 double_crochet red 2 double_crochet *remember to work around the yarn tails to hide them round 2 chain 2 make 3 double_crochet in the first st followed by 2 double_crochet in the next st repeat around join with a slip_stitch 20 sts for round 2 complete the then stop at the complete the for a smoother double_crochet last pull through double_crochet colour change using the next before the colour using the next stop at the last pull colour red change colour pink through before the next colour fasten_off the pink and continue with red
